TEXT.TITLE: ADOBE RESOURCES CORP <ADB> 3RD QTR NET
TEXT.BODY: Shr loss two cts vs loss 41 cts Net profit 4,134,000 vs loss 3,682,000 Revs 22.8 mln vs 23.5 mln Nine mths Shr profit 44 cts vs loss 1.99 dlrs Net profit 25.6 mln vs loss 26.8 mln Revs 73.4 mln vs 86.7 mln NOTE: 1987 qtr and nine mths includes gain 1,374,000 dlrs, or five cts per share, and 10.2 mln dlrs, or 41 cts per share, respectively, from net operating loss carryforward. 1987 qtr and nine mths includes loss 4,850,000 dlrs, or 16 cts per share, and loss 14.6 mln dlrs, or 58 cts per share, respectively, from payment of preferred dividends. 1986 qtr and nine mths includes loss 4,850,000 dlrs, or 23 cts per share, and 14.6 mln dlrs, or 70 cts per share, respectively, from payment of preferred dividends.
